MAIN_MESSAGE: There is a power cut in the CH6 and CH8 postcode area of Bagillt and Holywell, affecting properties in the local area. We had no advance warning of this and only became aware of it at 5:08PM. Our engineers have arrived on site and confirmed the power cut has been caused by a broken piece of equipment. Our team will work to get your power back on as quickly and as safely as possible. We expect the power to be restored by 7:15PM. We will update this message if this information changes. We apologise for the inconvenience and thank you for your patience. This message was updated at 6:00PM on 24th November 2020.
